DarkMouse::

"No. Black Aracnia is in good with Hell Beast and Megatron. I've seen 
them. They walk together now all the time. They have plans. Their 
going to change the old base to a moving underwater base."
She smiled. "Well, nowing a lot about computers and ease dropping 
does help once in a while. But you can't trust Aracnia. She'll tell 
Megatron everything." she had a worried look on her face. She felt 
that something wasn't right with Quickstike. She knew he liked her, 
but how much, she couldn't say. She didn't want to hurt him by 
telling him this, but he had to know. "Look, Aracnia and Megatron are 
working side by side. I can't take the chance and trust her now. I 
got left behind once, and was counted for as dead. I didn't return 
because I'm sure she would have thought me a traitor or something. 
I'm no traitor, but I got to do what I can to stay alive.  your the 
only one I trust. I don't trust Megatron, Aracnia, Hell Beast, or 
KitKat. It's just you and me. I know KitKat's a good leader and all, 
but she listens to her spark and not her head. She's bound to get 
killed. When that happens, I'm toast. So, what do you say, we stick 
together on this?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike grinned at Dark Mouse. "Sure thing. Maybe we oughta 
talk 
> t' Black Arachnia. Or jus' me if ya want." He wondered if telling 
her 
> that Black Arachnia was pregnant was a good idea or not. She was 
> after all a trusted friend.
